last_episode_to_air.name: Blade Star
last_episode_to_air.overview: Elina sees Kayla's friends and family as a distraction, but Kayla needs them now more than ever. Bear has second thoughts... but is it too late?

name: Zero Chill
overview: Talented teen figure skater Kayla is forced to leave everything behind when her family follows her twin brother, Mac, to a prestigious hockey academy.

episodes.name: Come and Take It from Me
episodes.overview: Mac's off to a rocky start on his quest to impress his new team. Later on, a lonely Kayla makes a connection with a mysterious skater on the ice.

episodes.name: Secret Skater
episodes.overview: While working to unmask the mystery skater, Kayla learns things about Ava and Sky that she didn't expect. Sky opens up to Mac about her past.

episodes.name: Sucker Punch
episodes.overview: Mac wants to bond with his teammates, but his arrogance keeps getting in the way. Kayla tracks down Jacob, and Ava's mom prepares a "special surprise."

episodes.name: Ice Breaker
episodes.overview: Kayla's determined to prove that she and Jacob are the perfect pair. Mac faces off with a former enemy. Ava dons a disguise to be part of the team.

episodes.name: We Do Our Talking on the Ice
episodes.overview: Sky tries to warn Kayla that Jacob has doubts — but it's mistaken for jealousy. Ava makes a big decision. Mac uncovers Kayla's plan to ruin his game.

episodes.name: Head Rush
episodes.overview: As Mac struggles to regain his confidence, Ava pushes her dad to put her on the ice. At the hospital, Holly blames Kayla for putting Sky in danger.

episodes.name: Triple Threat
episodes.overview: Elina makes Kayla an offer, and Bear and Sam get an unexpected visitor. Mac and Kayla both need Sky's support — but who will she choose?

episodes.name: Guilt Trip
episodes.overview: With team morale at an all-time low — and Mac's suffering at an all-time high — Ava makes a confession. Kayla begins her training with Elina.

episodes.name: This Is Happening
episodes.overview: The pressure's on as Kayla works hard to prove that Mac's not the only one who can win. Bear burdens Mac with a secret before the big game.

episodes.name: Blade Star
episodes.overview: Elina sees Kayla's friends and family as a distraction, but Kayla needs them now more than ever. Bear has second thoughts... but is it too late?
